programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 29
programme.desc: (R) Shuxian is worried when Zhixin says he will divorce his wife. Shuxian has only wanted to date Zhixin for fun and has not considered a future with him. Xianyu Xi discovers that Nanjiu is the boss of the bakery. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)志新说要跟老婆离婚，然后对书贤负责。书贤只是为了一时的刺激才会跟志新搞暧昧，根本没想过要跟志新结婚。书贤着急，找知浩帮忙。鲜于希到面包店问候生病的知秀，发现南九就是面包店老板。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 30
programme.desc: (R) Zhixiu is enraged when she discovers that Zhi-an has known about the truth long ago. She feels that Zhi-an has not treated her like a family member and has also valued material gains more than their relationship. Zhixiu asks to meet Zhi-an and subsequently slaps Zhi-an. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)知秀发现知安早就知道她们的身份对调，却没有通知她，觉得知安没有把她当家人看待，而且爱钱比爱她多，于是约知安见面然后打知安一巴掌。.

programme.title: 金装律师 Suits - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Kangshuo agrees to help Heyan stop Xian Jize from returning to the law firm on the condition that Heyan employs Jin Wenxi. Wenxi is threatened by Jinshi on her first day of work at KANG & HAM. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)康硕答应帮荷妍阻止咸基泽回姜与咸律师所上班，但条件是要荷妍聘请金文熙检察官。文熙第一天上班就被槿识威胁。.

programme.title: 我也可以是韩星 Miss Korea - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) In the new season of Miss Korea, 2 young ladies from totally different cultures and background (one Chinese who lives in Australia & the other Singaporean) will leave the comfort of their homes and embark on a 3 months journey to fulfil a K-Pop dream in Korea... (重)两个来自完全不同文化和生活背景的女生Julia和Jojo为了完成她们的韩星梦,远赴韩国进行3个月的造星训练。在人生地不熟的环境下,两个女生可否能和睦共处? 他们会实现梦想吗? 敬请期待!

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 37
programme.desc: (R) Shuzi faints when she discovers that Zhenshu is Xiantai's mother-in-law. Both Shuzi and Yinghao object to the marriage between Xiantai and Xiuqing. As they cannot reveal the real reason behind their objection, they tell Xiuqing that they think Zhenshu is an unlucky woman as her daughter has passed away before her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)淑子发现贤泰的岳母原来就是真淑，激动地晕倒。淑子将贤泰岳母的身份告诉英鎬，两人反对秀卿嫁给贤泰。因为不能说出反对的原因，两人于是告诉秀卿真淑白发人送黑发人，是个晦气的女人。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) A pregnant lady with complications boarded the hospital ship needing urgent Caesarian. Despite having no experiences, Enzai and team proceed with the operation after the lady's family consented. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)医疗船来了一名脐带脱垂的孕妇病人，要马上剖腹产子才能救下母子二人，可是恩在从来没有参与过生产的手术。眼见母子二人性命攸关，在家属的同意下，恩在和大家立刻进行剖腹产子。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 31
programme.desc: Zhi-an revisits a beach that she has gone with her family a long time ago. Thereafter, she goes deep into the woods and attempts suicide. Zhixiu moves in with the Cuis, but she is not willing to change her past habits. This causes Mingxi to be extremely displeased with her. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安到曾经跟家人去过的海边玩了一个下午，然后到树林里服药了结生命。知秀提着行李搬到崔家去，却没有打算改掉自己过去的生活习惯，令明熙对她非常不满意。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 32
programme.desc: Xianyu Xi discovers that Nanjiu has long known that she is divorced from her ex-husband and suspects that Nanjiu has deliberately gotten close to her to exact revenge on her. Xianyu He finds Zhi-an unexpectedly when he goes to the countryside with Zhixiu. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)鲜于希发现南九早就知道她已经离婚了，于是认定南九是为了要向她报复才故意接近她的。鲜于赫带着知秀到郊外去买木头和海盐，竟意外地找到失踪多时的知安。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 2 Hello Taiwan S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: This programme takes a look at some of Taiwan's famous eateries and dishes. Most importantly, the programme also reveals the moving story behind its success. 介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 10
programme.desc: Eric receives an email from Peter, stating that Linda was killed because of her secret dealings with the Guo family, Long Hang and Shi Na Da. Eric is worried that these files will further implicate him and he takes a step back, even though he had initially promised Hao Sen that he would continue to unlock the encrypted files. (PG-些许暴力画面)Eric收到Peter的电邮，称Linda是因为手上拥有涉及郭家与龙航、史耐达两间企业往来的秘密档案，才会死于非命。Eric担忧这些档案将给他带来杀身之祸，他原本答应豪森会继续解开这些加密档案，但此刻他却步了，担心引火焚身。.

programme.title: 最强大脑 第四季 The Brain China S4 - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) The Brain is a talent show that celebrates gifted minds and incredible skills of extraordinary men, women, and children. In Season 4, the programme aims to disseminate scientific knowledge to more viewers, especially the youths. Tune in as popular artistes take up different challenges in each episode. (重)《最强大脑》是一个大型科学类脑力真人秀节目。第四季主打“让科学在年轻人中流行起来”，以青春为科学站台，向年轻人传播科学的重要性，并请来年轻人喜欢的青春偶像参加挑战。.

programme.title: Wasabi 新体验 Find The Wasabi 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) "Find the Wasabi 2" is a 'reality-game travelogue' series featuring 3 Asian celebrities who are on a special mission to find the 'secret spice' of Japan... In each episode, the Hunters are challenged by a powerful "Commander" to solve 'mysteries' about Japan that puzzle people around the world. (重)WASABI新体验第二季再出击，徐鸣杰将与来自泰国及马来西亚的朋友在日本学习当忍者，通过不同的任务竞赛，探索不为人知的日本文化，带给你潮流、美食、旅游等第一手资料，发现日本新魅力！这一系列的Wasabi主持人是性感女神藤原纪香。.

programme.title: 北京到莫斯科 Beijing To Moscow - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Kai Xiang finally remembers all the painful memories. After An Ran passed on, Kloudiia found it hard to move on and attempted unsuccessfully to take her own life. After she was recuperated, she left Kai Xiang without saying goodbye. Mei Ling told Kai Xiang that An Ran's death anniversary was coming up. Kai Xiang visits An Ran's grave and discovers a family portrait his son drew. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)凯翔终于记起了那段痛苦的时光。当时，他逃离婚礼，十万火急地赶到医院探望病危的儿子。那也是他和Kloudiia陪着安然，度过他短暂人生中最后的幸福时光。不料安然离世后，Kloudiia仍无法走出丧子之痛，割脉自杀。虽然被救活，Kloudiia却最终选择不告而别。而回到新加坡的凯翔，却不幸遇到车祸，醒来后把一切都忘记了……美玲告诉凯翔，安然的忌日将到。凯翔一行人来到安然的坟前祭拜。看着坟前安然画的全家福，凯翔拾起了一些和安然最后的回忆。.

programme.title: 混口饭吃而已 Hear My Thoughts - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Familiar real-life scenarios with hilarious caricature, Hear My Thoughts brings to attention the bottled-up sentiments of people at their workplace. (重)幽默短片《混口饭吃而已》，以逗趣的方式叙述各行各业的酸甜苦辣！打工仔的内心喊话及苦衷——只有自己最清楚，真相也绝非你所能想象！演员阵容包括：田铭耀、鐘琴、王智荟、胡佳嬑、坤华、罗翊绮及林茜茜，还有客串嘉宾周崇庆、权怡凤、朱厚任等。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) It is said that India is the world's largest open-air toilet. Nearly 600 million people and half of India's population, still defecate outdoors. Can you imagine more than 53% of households and as high as 70% in rural areas do not have any toilets? Why do Indians do not like to build toilets at home? (重)有人说，印度是世界最大的露天厕所，因为有将近6亿人在户外解决问题，占了印度人口的一半。超过百分之53，农村的比例还高达百分之70的家庭，没有厕所，你能想象吗？为什么印度人不喜欢在家里建厕所呢？.

programme.title: 美食攻略 Big Food - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Every year the festive season creates a "mad rush" for the kitchen staff of Four Seasons Hotel in Singapore. 300 log cakes and 250 turkeys are just a fraction of what it takes to feed thousands of guests at the hotel. To top it off, right in the midst of Christmas, they're opening a new restaurant! (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Wancai finds out that his transfer to the logistics unit has caused a co-worker to lose his job. The co-worker needs the job to provide for his family and is therefore unforgiving towards Wancai. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)万才发现因为他坚持不名誉退休，令公司把他调到物流仓库去，导致一名员工因为万才被裁员。该员工家有妻小，一直希望有份固定的工作，于是生气地指万才令他的梦想破灭。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Yuzhen is pestered by reporters outside the hospital. Haixiu claims that she is Yuzhen's girlfriend to help him out. Yiyuan witnesses the incident and dislikes Haixiu even more. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宇真在医院外被记者纠缠。宇真声称跟艺苑没有瓜葛，但记者们不信，一直咄咄逼人。海秀为了帮宇真解围，说自己是宇真的女友。艺苑目睹一切，嘴上说不介意，心里却对海秀更加厌恶。.

programme.title: 危情三日 3 Days - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Taiqing requests for a reinstatement of his duties in order to escort the President to his meeting with Daochen. Meanwhile, Baoyuan is in danger when she visits Ciying at the hospital. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)泰庆不放心总统与道辰会面，主动要求复职与其同行，而此时去医院探望次英的宝媛再次陷入危险。.

programme.title: 危情三日 3 Days - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Baoyuan and Ciying are kidnapped in the hospital. The President stops the kidnappers in time but only manages to save Baoyuan. Meanwhile, Taiqing discovers the secret hideout of the Caixun Group. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宝媛和次英在医院遭绑架，总统及时拦下他们却只救下宝媛。泰庆在财信集团的地下停车场发现可疑的车辆，一路追踪之下，找到了财信集团的秘密基地。.

programme.title: 无限歌谣季 Unlimited Song Season - EP 14
programme.desc: A variety show that allows the professional singer-songwriters to collaborate with non-professionals who were deemed to have potential to excel in the music industry. (最后一集)该节目以音乐节为形式，让专业音乐人化身“无限唱作人"和非专业的“歌谣研修生"搭档创作新音乐.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 7
programme.desc: Shengzhu waits for Enzhao at the office for a meeting but Enzhao does not turn up. It happens that Enzhao had purposely lured Shengzhu away in order to speak privately to Wuhe who has assumed the name Zuodou. Director Hong introduced Eric Zhao, director of Qingyuetang, to Shengzhu. Shengzhu realised that he is the man she has quarrelled with at the carpark and felt a little awkward. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)胜珠在办公室等着恩照开会，但她却迟迟没出现。原来恩照故意支开胜珠，想和化名为作斗的吴赫单独谈话。洪代表介绍清月堂的艾瑞克赵代表给胜珠认识时，胜珠才发现他竟是之前在停车场与她起纠纷的男人，不免有些尴尬。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 8
programme.desc: With Zuodou's advice, Shengzhu invites her good friends to visit them with their husband. Her good friends are very happy for Shengzhu when they see Shengzhu and Zuodou interacting intimately. Enzhao cannot get over Zuodou and tries all means to get him back to her. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)在作斗的建议下，胜珠邀请好友带着老公前来探访。好友见胜珠和作斗互动亲密恩爱，替胜珠感到很开心。恩照无法忘记作斗，不断想尽方法尝试让他回到自己身边。.

programme.title: 信号 Signal - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Haiying finds out who the real culprit of the Renzhou Gang Rape Case is. When Haiying goes back to Renzhou and calls one of the perpetrators' friend, he unexpectedly discovers Chief Zhishou's whereabouts before his death. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海英发现仁州女高中生集体性侵案的真正主犯。海英回到仁州致电其中一位肇事者的朋友查询有关资料时，意外得知安治守股长临死前，在仁州警局要求调查朴海英他哥自杀案的资料。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 Sound Of My Dream S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Sound Of My Dream is a music program which invites Chinese pop singers to challenge musicians and other singers to pit their skills. Mentors and singers put in their best to show the essence of music, regardless of the outcome. (重)《梦想的声音》（原《声音的战争》）是一档由浙江卫视所打造的音乐节目，邀请到华语乐坛歌手面对面进行“歌艺过招”，导师与素人歌手抛开所有包袱，毫无保留的相互讨教，竭尽所能展现出音乐本质。.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) From horny goat weeds to pearls that are eaten! Do you have the appetite for adventure? Find out how pearls - yes, that jewellery staple - can slay pimples. And which popular food ingredient has deadly cyanide in it. Are you broke? Well, Peifen knows a place where wild (and free) durians grow. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) In South Korean history, there is a pioneer female royal doctor called "Da Chang-Jin", who created superb imperial cuisine for the king. As host Michelle Chia savours the tales of Da Chang-Jin's life, she discovers the delectable and nutritious tastes of these old royal recipes. (重)韩国史书上记载的首位女御医大长今，熔古铸今，创造出超群绝伦的宫廷御膳。珍馐美馔，不仅是一国之君调理养身的基石，更是舌尖上的一大欢飨。遵循《大长今》故事细腻的笔触，谢韵仪将探索韩国宫廷御膳料理的奥妙。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) In a country known for its recent pain of civil strife and its love of Cricket, a group of teenage girls have decided to form a soccer team and bend it like Beckham. Nothing unusual about that, except that these girls have made it to third spot in the National Soccer League - and are doing so without even the most basic soccer gear - not even a single pair of boots. Host Pei Fen lugs her special delivery of boots onto a train - for the long ride from Colombo to Kilinochchi... (重)六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Bjorn visits local food SMEs - Lim Kee and Bakers Heaven, which are both adamant that quality should not be compromised but instead, improved with automation. (重)在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Shengxian looks up Yuzhen at the hospital. He first tries to get Yuzhen to give up Yiyuan by offering him money and a good job in return. When that fails, he humiliates Yuzhen in front of Yiyuan. Yuzhen is angered and wants to fight for Yiyuan's hand in marriage. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)胜贤到医院找宇真，首先企图用名利诱惑宇真放弃艺苑，接着在艺苑面前羞辱宇真。宇真被激怒，开口要艺苑跟着他。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Xiubin loses her way when she tries to go to her paternal grandparents' home on her own. She bumps into Tong Bai and follows Tong Bai home instead. Haixiu bumps into Taizhen and Yunjing when she is on the way to bring Xiubin home. Yunjing accuses Haixiu to be a kidnapper. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀彬想去找太真，却在半途迷路。秀彬遇到桐白，于是跟着桐白回家。海秀回家后看到秀彬，担心秀彬的家人找不到她会着急，于是立刻要带秀彬回家。海秀和秀彬在半路碰到太真和允晶。允晶没有搞清楚状况就指海秀是拐带犯。.

programme.title: 危情三日 3 Days - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Ciying calls Baoyuan to rescue her from Daochen's hands. She provides an important lead to Special Prosecutor Cui which helps to identify a mole. Daochen is arrested after a failed attempt to assassinate the President. However, Taiqing discovers that a mole is still hiding in the Blue House. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)次英挣脱道辰的束缚后，立刻联系宝媛来找她，并向崔特检透露一条重要的线索。她的证词成功令一名内鬼被揪出。道辰暗杀总统失败遭到拘捕。总统希望回到梁津里拜祭死者，泰庆发现青瓦台仍有内鬼存在。.

programme.title: 危情三日 3 Days - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) The real traitor, Wen Chengmin, cuts off the President's contact with outside world with EMP bombs. Taiqing realises that the enemy is tapping their communication. He lies about the President's whereabouts and manages to lead the President away from danger. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真正的内奸指挥长文成民利用EMP弹使总统与外界失联。警卫官们为了保护总统，在枪战中纷纷牺牲。泰庆知道敌方在窃听他们的通讯，为了让总统逃离危险，他谎报总统的位置，使总统得以脱身。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 5
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. 与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 9
programme.desc: Shengzhu quarrels with her mother when she finds out that her mother has found caused trouble with Zuodou when she was not home. Enzhao asks Shengzhu to take her home on the pretext that she is not feeling well. She uses the opportunity to ask Shengzhu how she got married with Zuodou. However, Shengzhu refuses to say much about it. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)当胜珠知道母亲趁她不在家时来找作斗麻烦后，和母亲大吵。恩照表演完后以不舒服为借口要胜珠照顾，让她陪自己回家。她想借机套问胜珠如何和作斗结婚，但胜珠不想多说。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 10
programme.desc: Three grannies from the village visit Zuodou just when he is about to leave Seoul. They make Zuodou goes shopping with them and eventually brings them back to stay at Shengzhu's house. Shengzhu's mother discovers that Zuodou is a fake name and thinks Wu Zuodou is a con man. Shengzhu gets curious about Zuodou's name after becoming closer to him. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)作斗正准备离开首尔时，乡下的三位奶奶们突然来找他，逼得作斗陪她们逛街，最后还带三人回到胜珠家住。韩母发现吴作斗这个名字是假的，认为吴作斗是个骗子。与作斗变得亲近后，胜珠不禁对他的真名也感到好奇。.

programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 信号 Signal - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) Caihan wakes up in the hospital and finds Xiuxian dozing off beside him. He feels awkward when he recalls Xiuxian confessing her love to him in the ambulance. Meanwhile, he receives a call from Shanyu and rushes to Renzhou to look for him. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)材韩在医院醒来，见到在一旁打瞌睡的秀贤，想起她在救伤车里向他表白爱意，顿时感十分尴尬。正巧这时他接到刚从少年感化所出狱的善宇的电话，立刻带伤去仁州找善宇。.

programme.title: 料理的秘密 Food Secrets - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Sushi restaurants in Japan serves just 6 customers per meal, and commands $200 for 15 sushi, yet they can be fully booked for 2 months. What is the secret to their success? The skill of slicing sashimi, the technique of moulding sushi, the strict selection of ingredients or passion for their craft? (重)日本高级寿司餐馆一餐仅限服务6位客人，而每个套餐15贯寿司叫价200新元，还得预约两个月。到底这些寿司屋虏获食客芳心的秘诀是什么？是切生鱼片的技巧？捏寿司的功夫？对食材的严格筛选？还是对料理的执着和热忱？.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Men do not show their fragility in front of women and what women perceive is the strong image portray by the men. However, research reveals that men do have their weak moments! What are some of the views from the men and is it true that women are the stronger one in today's context? (重)男人往往都很少在女人面前表现自己脆弱的一面，而女人看到的都是男人坚强无比的外表。但是调查显示，原来男人也有脆弱时刻！Man爆的男嘉宾对于课题有什么见解？现今社会，难道女人才是强者？.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 38
programme.desc: (R) Zhenshu stops herself from revealing her relationship with Xiuqing when Xiuqing says she does not want to see her birth mother at all. Xianying deduces that Xiuqing is Zhenshu's daughter. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真淑亲耳听到秀卿说对亲生母亲很不谅解，一点都不想见她，觉得很心痛，本来想说出她和秀卿的关系，后来说不出口。仙英从种种线索推断出秀卿就是真淑的亲生女儿。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) Doosung Group works with Geoji Jeil Hospital to promote remote medical services and plan to decommission the hospital ship. Enzai is under investigation for malpractice as a result of the critical condition of the baby she helped to delivered. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)斗星会长打算尽快通过远程医疗法案，让医疗保健市场赚个盆满砵满。由于医疗船是最大的妨碍因素，会长布下了饵设局铲除医疗船。同时, 恩在接到警局通告说有人举报她的医疗过失。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 33
programme.desc: Boss Kong tells Xianyu He about how he found Zhi-an previously. Worried that Zhi-an may try to take her own life again, Boss Kong deliberately arranges for Zhi-an to work at his factory. He keeps her occupied at all times to prevent her from harbouring self-harm thoughts again. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)孔老板告诉鲜于赫知安曾经自杀。孔老板在知安的眼里看到绝望，担心知安会再次自寻短见，于是故意把她留在海苔加工厂，并要她不断地工作，以免她胡思乱想。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 34
programme.desc: Zhi-an attempts to run away from the factory now that Xianyu He has located her. Xianyu He stops her mid-way and decides to work at the factory too to keep an eye on Zhi-an. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安的行踪被鲜于赫发现后想在夜深人静的时候离开海苔工厂，却被鲜于赫阻止。鲜于赫担心知安再次逃走，决定到工厂跟她一起工作，守护着她。.

programme.title: 北京到莫斯科 Beijing To Moscow - EP 12
programme.desc: On An Ran's death anniversary, Kai Xiang meets up with Kloudiia. The two catch up while acknowledging the distance that now separated them as strangers. Kloudiia summons all her courage and tells Kai Xiang the true reason why she left without a farewell. The two embrace as they finally let go of all the pain and trauma. Kenneth can no longer keep up the facade, and confesses his feelings to Xiao Qi, who remains undecided between the two. 在安然忌日那天，凯翔一行人得以机会见到了Kloudiia。凯翔和Kloudiia就像熟悉又陌生的的朋友寒暄叙旧。Kloudiia鼓起勇气主动对凯翔说起当年分手，不告而别的(PG)原因，还有安然发生意外的真相，两人抱在一起，多年的心痛，在这一刻得到了解放和释然。。。另一边，筱琦对Kenneth坦白，自己早在五年前就和Kloudiia 面对面见过了，但是已对凯翔动心的筱琦却选择隐瞒实情。Kenneth也不再伪装，他对筱琦表白，这趟旅程已经走完。他希望筱琦可以跟他一起离开，筱琦陷入两难…….

programme.title: 生活达人 Life's Perfectionists Sr 9 - EP 2
programme.desc: This programme introduces individuals who are outstanding in their respective fields of work. Find out how the featured individuals rose to the top of their leagues based on hard work and enthusiasm. (双声道-中/韩)本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 11
programme.desc: Wei Yun's car gets burned down. Eric, who had been driving the car, is nowhere to be found, and everyone thinks he has met with misfortune. Eric quietly looks for Brother Fa to explain to him about the situation and seeks for his support. Brother Fa is sceptical about it and arranges to meet with Wei Yun. Wei Yun passes Brother Fa the audio recording of their conversation that she has secretly recorded and tells him that she believes Eric is being framed. (PG)维芸的车子被烧毁，驾车的Eric下落不明，众人以为他凶多吉少。Eric悄然找上发哥，说出前因后果，寻求支援。发哥将信将疑，约维芸见面。维芸把她偷录的Eric的对话录音交给发哥，告诉发哥她相信Eric是被陷害的，他不是盗领案的主谋。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 2 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) This food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. (重)介绍台湾在地的美食与台湾各地严选食材.

programme.title: 求学地图 Schools Unlimited - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Our younger generation's first impression of Korea comes from Kpop idols and Korean dramas, is there be any difference in reality to live in Korea? What are the prospects of students studying in Korea? Let's see how 3 Singaporean students cope with study in Seoul and turn their dreams into reality. (重)年轻一代对韩国的印象，来自于带领潮流的韩国偶像与韩剧，在韩国生活跟想像中有什么不同？到韩国留学究竟有什么前景？看3位新加坡学生在看似熟悉但全然陌生的韩国首尔的求学生活， 他们如何将梦想与现实合二为一。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 39
programme.desc: (R) The DNA report confirms that Zhenshu and Xiuqing are biologically related. Xianying threatens Zhenshu with the report. She wants Zhenshu to stop Xiuqing from marrying Xiantai or she will tell Xiuqing that Zhenshu is the mother who abandoned her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)亲子鉴定报告证实真淑和秀卿是母女。仙英为了让秀卿回到载永身边，拿报告威胁真淑，要她阻止婚事，否则公开真淑和秀卿的关系，让秀卿知道真淑就是抛弃她的生母。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 23
programme.desc: (R) To protect Guoxian and the hospital ship; Enzai gives a false statement to the Police. Nevertheless, the hospital ship's operation is suspended. Everyone is sad to see the ship being towed away. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)恩在为了保护郭贤与医疗船，打算背负一切，向警察说了谎。金院长正式对外宣布医疗船的营运会暂时中断，此后还有可能停止营运服务，船上各人看医疗船被拖走,十分伤心。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 35
programme.desc: Mingxi arranges for Zhixiu to have a makeover, but Zhixiu still does not exude the airs associated with the upper class. Daojing finally meets Zhi-an, but Zhi-an gives him the cold shoulder treatment. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)明熙安排知秀去改头换面一番，但知秀仍然没有富家女的气质，还嘲笑崔家的作风很做作，令明熙很气煞。道京终于见到知安，但知安却不想理会他。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 36
programme.desc: Daojing gets Xianyu He to arrange for him to meet up with Zhi-an. Zhi-an listens to Daojing patiently, accepts his apology and leaves. Zhi-an's unusual calmness gets Daojing all worried again. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道京通过鲜于赫约知安见面。知安听了道京要说的话后，礼貌地接受他的道歉便离开。知安的举动跟以前很不一样，令道京很担心。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 3
programme.desc: Shaoxing is literary great Lu Xun's birthplace. His works contain faithful records of the city's food culture, and reflect the customs of Shaoxing society. Host Youyi immerses herself into Lu Xun's book, and explores the cultural nuances behind the culinary delights. 绍兴，是许多文人雅士生长的地方，更是大文豪鲁迅的故乡。这一集，透过绍兴饮食，折射出鲁迅笔下的风土民情，社会底层小人物的心境。主持人有懿身历其境，走进鲁迅笔下的书中世界，了解潜藏在碗中的饮食密码。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 12
programme.desc: Eric learns from the news that Wei Yun is putting herself in danger by investigating the case. He couldn't help but show up in front of Wei Yun as he is worried about her. Seeing that Eric is still alive, Wei Yun excitedly rushes forward to hug him and cries in his arms. Eric is surprised and touched by her action. Wei Yun tells Eric that she saw Dong Huang. (PG-部分画面令人不安)Eric从新闻中得知维芸因追查建案，人身遭受威胁，担心不已，终于忍不住在维芸面前现身。维芸见到Eric还活着，激动地冲上前抱住他，在Eric怀里哭了起來。Eric被她这个举动所打动，同时又有些意外。维芸告诉Eric，自己见过栋煌。.

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Tai Long, Owen and Hao Lun came to a small Nanyang eatery in a bid to earn the million-dollar Laksa recipe. Tai Long has a gift that allows him to see the different ingredients in each dish. He manages to see the secret of the Laksa and the lady boss, Yueniang, agrees to take him in. (PG)(重)三个年轻人即将得到老字号南洋风味小吃店价值一百万的Laksa祖传秘方。他们是风雨同舟的兄弟：商业奇才庄浩伦（包勋评饰）、刀神陈欧文（方伟杰饰）和烹饪天才何泰龙（冯伟衷饰），合称“H.O.T”。三个前科犯准备接管生意，创造更好的生活。他们将遇到为厨师梦而孤军奋战的曾美薇（雅慧饰）、扬言破坏他们声誉的大厨Gordon（George Young饰）和破坏弟弟泰龙幸福的泰虎（李腾饰）。H.O.T之间的忠诚和成功将会因为过去的阴影而再次接受挑战。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Mindanao has always been a hotbed for terrorist activities in Philippines. Rebels use money as bait to recruit kids and train them to kill. The social turmoil, changes in family structure and poverty have resulted in kids being sold to the rebel groups by their families and were forced to join war. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)棉兰老岛一直是菲律宾恐怖主义活动的温床。叛军以金钱作为诱饵，招募孩童加以训练，无知的童年记忆，沉浸在杀戮中。社会动荡时刻，家庭结构发生变革、破裂，贫困，导致一票孩童被家人卖到组织里，迫于投身战事中。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 40
programme.desc: (R) Zhenshu promises Shuzi and Meici that she will leave Seoul and never appear before Xiuqing again. Yinghao, Meici and Shuzi thus allow Xiuqin to marry Xiantai. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真淑向淑子和美慈承诺她会离开首尔，不会再出现在秀卿面前，请她们同意贤泰和秀卿的婚事。有了真淑的承诺，长辈们终于答应让秀卿嫁给贤泰。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 24
programme.desc: (R) Enzai bumps into Dong Wen's wife who shows symptoms of acute hepatic deficiency. However, she gets kicked out by the Hospital Chief Jin before Enzai could examine the patient. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)恩在遇到医疗船事务长的妻子出现事故要施手术的状况，恩在不忍心放下事务长的妻子，于是打算出手相救，可惜此时院长来到阻拦恩在，并命她立即离开。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 37
programme.desc: Taixiu faints from exhaustion after searching for Zhi-an endlessly and heads to the police station to enquire if there is any unclaimed corpse as soon as he regains consciousness. Daojing takes pity on Taixiu and reveals Zhi-an's whereabouts to him. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)太修终日寻找知安，终于不支晕倒，醒来后还立刻到警局向警方查询是否有找到无名尸。道京不忍心看着太修心急如焚的样子，终于向太修透露知安的下落。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 38
programme.desc: Mingxi cannot accepts Zhixiu's likes and preferences. The two quarrel and Zhixiu demands to move out. Zhi-an gives Daojing a big scolding when Daojing admits that he was the one who told Taixiu about Zhi-an's whereabouts. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)明熙始终不能接受知秀的喜好，两母女为此大吵一架，知秀生气地说要搬出去住。道京向知安承认自己将知安的下落告诉太修。知安对道京破口大骂，并要他从此消失在她眼前。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 5
programme.desc: In the mountainous area of Tuyen Quang province, Vietnam, is a tribal commune isolated from modernity and from loved ones who have gone to the cities in search of better lives. Emails and SMS-es are practically non-existent to the point where the tribes rely on a special postman to deliver items from loved ones. Host Daniel Hutchinson joins the postman in delivering personal packages to the families but not before embarking on an arduous journey to where the tribes are situated. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 5
programme.desc: The idea of exporting food is always met with the first and toughest hurdle: shelf-life extension. In this episode, Bjorn checks out the methods employed by two local food SMEs, The Soup Spoon and Tan Seng Kee to prolong the lifespan of their food products in order to expand globally. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 13
programme.desc: Hao Sen travels to Taiwan to meet Wei Yun but unexpectedly sees Eric instead. Hao Sen is surprised when Eric tells Hao Sen that Yan Feng had been monitoring his every move. Eric requests Hao Sen to sign an agreement to ensure that he can continue to work at Teng Sheng after he returns to Singapore. Hao Sen agrees and wants Eric to continue to help him decrypt the files. (PG)豪森应维芸之约，到台湾与她见面，没想到现身的却是Eric。Eric告诉豪森，延丰一直监视着他的一举一动，豪森感惊讶。Eric要求豪森签下协议书，保证自己返回新加坡之后，能继续在腾升工作。豪森答应，要Eric继续帮他解密档案。.

programme.title: 买卖 Business As Usual - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) In China, you can find any kind of "customised services" online, from running an errand for you, to proposing to your girlfriend on your behalf. These new services have improved consumers' quality of life and opened up a new market. How will these services impact our lives in the future? (重)中国电子商务从销售实际商品，到推出各种"客制化服务"，不管是跑腿代办，代人告白求分手，还是私厨登门煮饭。这些新兴服务提升客户的生活品质，并开创崭新的经济市场。这些服务将对你我未来的生活造成哪些冲击呢？.

programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) The new season of "The Food Detectives" continues the culinary exploration of the foods we eat and more. Host Nikki Muller, will debunk the myths, delve into the unknowns and provide useful information to help us make informed choices for the meals we enjoy and how they fit into our lifestyles. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 寂寞鱼•听见 A Lonely Fish - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Jing Xuan is a 3rd-year polytechnic student. At home, she always has to face argument between her parents. In school, she is being outcast by her classmates and nicknamed 'A Lonely Fish'. Jing Xuan best and only friend is Kora who is popular in school. One day, on her way to the classroom, Jing Xuan has a brief encounter with Yi Kai near the vending machine. When Jing Xuan is inside the toilet cubicle, she overheard Xiao Wei and Min Min's conversation and is upset to learn that Kora had been taken advantage of by them. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)蓝静萱是理工学院三年级的学生。在家，她经常听到父母的吵架声，在学校，她因为不合群而受到同学们的排斥。Kora是学校里的校花，也是静萱的唯一朋友。 这一天，静萱如往常上课，在学校的饮料贩卖机前与亦凯有了一面之缘。后来在厕所里，静萱听见小薇和敏敏之间的对话，得知Kora又被人家占便宜。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 41
programme.desc: (R) Yingxin finds the letter that Zhenshu left behind and discovers that Zhenshu has left home. Zhenshu writes in her letter that she wants to lead an independent life now that her dependents are all grown up. Xiuzhe consoles the upset Yingxin. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)英心看到真淑留下的信，发现真淑离家了。真淑没有说出离家的真正原因，而是说孩子大了，想过独立的生活。英心找玉顺帮忙，但还是找不到真淑。英心心急如焚，秀哲在旁安慰。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 25
programme.desc: (R) The Chairman of Doosung group requests that Chief Jin fire Enzai should he invest in the hospital. Chief Jin is torn between saving the hospital and undertaking the operation. Enzai finally gets his support. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)斗星会长向金院长要求辞去恩在，并接受斗星的投资，金院长十分为难。恩在坚决为了患者，为大家做手术，恩在幸得到金院长的支持，但医院却面临倒闭危机。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 39
programme.desc: (R) Zhixiu assumes that Yanghao is a warm elderly when he appears to welcome her wholeheartedly. Behind her back however, Yanghao instructs Zaicheng and Mingxi to send Zhixiu overseas immediately and to keep her identity a secret so as not to jeopardise the marriages arranged for Daojing and Shuxian. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)阳浩表现地非常欢迎知秀，令知秀错误地以为阳浩是个温暖的人，但阳浩却在私下命令载成和明熙立刻把知秀送出国留学，并将她的身份保密，以免影响道京和书贤的婚事。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 40
programme.desc: Suluo detects that Daojing has feelings for another woman. She wants Daojing to end everything with the other woman before he marries her. Daojing tries to deny any involvement with another woman, but fails. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)素萝察觉到道京心里有别的女人，要他把对另一个女人的感情处理掉才跟她结婚。道京尝试否认，但被素萝识破。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 5
programme.desc: The New People's Army in the Philippines is listed as a terrorist organisation by USA and Philippines and it has been estimated of claiming 30,000 lives during rebellion. In recent years, many members have abandoned their weapons. Does this act mean a loss of trust in justice or turning over a new leaf? (PG-部分画面令人不安)在菲律宾，有个叫NPA的新人民军的组织，被美国和菲律宾列为恐怖组织，据军方估计，该组织的叛乱已夺走三万人性命，近年有不少的组织成员弃械投降。 器械投诚到底是对正义之名失去信任，还是想重新开始呢？.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 14
programme.desc: Picaud impersonates as Brother Fa and sends an email to Eric, resulting in Eric's laptop to be attacked by a virus and causing all of the files to be locked. Eric logs into cloud storage and is relieved he has made a backup of Linda's file. Eric says that he will try to fix the virus in his laptop and lets Brother Fa to investigate on Picaud's whereabouts. (PG)Picaud假冒发哥的名字寄电邮给Eric，导致Eric的电脑中毒，所有档案都被锁住。Eric登入云端储存器，显示Linda的档案，幸好在云端做了备份。Eric表示自己会尝试解决电脑中毒问题，让发哥去调查Picaud的行踪。.
